title: No, Tom Selleck is not the spokesperson for oil products for the Convention on Biological Diversity.
subtitle: We discovered the mystery behind online advertisements that included Canabidol, or the Convention on Biological Diversity, oil products that included Tom Seleke, Drew Carey, Tom Hanks, Randy Jackson, and Halle Berry.
author: Jordan Liles
vclaim: Tom Selleck is the spokesperson for oil products of the Convention on Biological Diversity.
